===============

**Tender Notice**
---------------

### Building Automation Systems (BAS) Installation, Repairs, and Maintenance

**Contract Title**: W6896-23S085.C - Standing Offer for Building Automation Systems (BAS) Installation, Repairs, and Maintenance

**Reference Number**: WS3989946810-Doc4220324955

**Publication Date**: 2023-09-19
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-05, 14:00 EST ( EST 02:00 PM)

**Amendment Information**: Amendment 1, dated 2023-09-20

**Contracting Entity**
--------------------

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact Person: Christopher Lau (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**End-User Entity**
------------------

* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Tender Description**
--------------------

This Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) is a reissued version of the original RFSO W6896-23S085/B, dated 2023-07-26, with a closing date of 2023-08-11, 14:00 EST. The new closing date is 2023-10-05, 14:00 EST.

Work under this Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) includes providing skilled licensed labor, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and materials for building automation systems (BAS) installation, repairs, and maintenance for the Real Property Operations Group (West) (RPOps(W)) – Detachment Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba. Services are to be provided on an "as and when required" basis.

**Notes for Suppliers**
----------------------

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the closing date and time.
* Any bids submitted after the closing date and time will be considered non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

------------------------
